template.name: logd
template.value: val tag = "${'$'}{TAG}" val methodName = object{}.javaClass.enclosingMethod?.name ?: "unknown" val parameters = arrayOf(${'$'}{PARAMETERS}) val parameterValues = arrayOf(${'$'}{PARAMETER_VALUES}) android.util.Log.d(tag, "Method: ${'$'}{methodName} - Parameters: ${'$'}{parameters.joinToString()} - Values: ${'$'}{parameterValues.joinToString()}")
